Name: The Trap
About the game: You got trapped in the labyrinth and need to find an exit. All you got is an old flashlight, while world around is trying to get rid of you! Use flashlight to resist darkness and evil, solve puzzles and explore dungeons and nether realms in The Trap, dark arcade adventure will elements of psychological horror! - Whole set of phobias, including arachnophobia, claustrophobia and many more! - Unique game mechanics built on flashlight usage and blinking in order to survive! - Some traps are arcade, while some will require your imagination to pass by! - Hardcore surrounding world! Every item and trap will do their best to make you start from the beginning! - Scary atmospheric graphic and sounds will make you feel you are really there!
